MRNA_PREPARATION_INITIAL_MRNA_QNTY: The Ribo Zero input is 0.2 µg of total RNA. The Ribo Zero Step is integrated in the library preparation protocol and has no separate amount measurement
EXTRACTION_PROTOCOL_MRNA_ENRICHMENT: 200 ng Total RNA in 16 µl processed with the Ribo Zero Gold Kit (Epicentre; RZG1224). The used Volume of Removal Solution is 2 µl and the Extraction is followed by an Ethanol precipitation
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_POLYMERASE_TYPE: The PCR Master Mix from the TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011) is used for library amplification PCR
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_THERMOCYCLING_PRO: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011). 98°C for 30 seconds. 10-15 cycles (depending of qPCR Results) of: 98°C for 10 seconds, 60°C for 30 seconds, 72°C for 30 seconds, 72°C for 5 minutes. Hold at 10°C
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_RNA_ADAPTER_LIGATION_: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_RNA_ADAPTER_SEQUENCE: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
RNA_PREPARATION_3'_RNA_ADAPTER_SEQUENCE: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_TEMPLATE_CONC: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_PRIMER_CONC: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_R_PRIMER_SEQUENCE: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_PRODUCT_ISOLATION: The amplificated library is purified with AMPure XP Beads as is described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
RNA_PREPARATION_REVERSE_TRANSCRIPTION_PR: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
As described in Sultan et al. (BBRC, 2012)
RNA_PREPARATION_3'_RNA ADAPTER_LIGATION_: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_PHOSPHORYLATION: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
EXTRACTION_PROTOCOL_FRAGMENTATION: Fragmentation is done at 94°C for 8 minutes with the EPF Mix described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
EXTRACTION_PROTOCOL: TRIzol RNA Isolation for Cells (5-10E+6). TRIzol (Life Technologies) RNA Isolation, performed following the manufacturer instruction to isolate total RNA, used 1 ml TRIzol per Sample. Followed by Isopropyl alcohol/Ethanol precipitation
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_DEPHOSPHORYLATION: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_F_PRIMER_: As described in TruSeq RNA Sample Preparation v2 Guide (Illumina, Aug. 2011)
